mapper.select: select rownum, emp_no "empNo", emp_name "empName", hire_date "hireDate", phone_num "phoneNum", dept_name "deptName", position "position", email "email" from emp order by rownum
mapper.insert: insert into emp (emp_no, emp_name, phone_num, email, hire_date, password, role_id) values(#{empNo}, #{empName}, #{phoneNum}, #{email}, to_date(#{hireDate},'yyyy/MM/DD'), #{password}, 'ROLE_USER')
mapper.select: select password from emp where emp_no = #{name}
